# Raja Cycle Mart (RCM) - Digital Evolution 2026

## Overview
Raja Cycle Mart is a 35-year legacy bicycle shop that has evolved into a high-performance digital engine. It serves as a benchmark for local business digital transformation.

## Core Modules & Services
- **Module 01: High-Fidelity Storefront**: Premium, responsive web presence optimized for 4K and mobile.
- **Module 02: Smart Booking Console**: Automated service slot management with WhatsApp bot integration.
- **Module 03: Loyalty Mechanics**: OTP-verified Lucky Draw system for lead generation (Firebase-backed).
- **Module 04: Growth Intelligence**: Deep data analytics via Google Analytics 4 (GA4).
- **Module 05: Service Logistics**: Distance-based pricing and home-service pre-diagnosis.
- **Module 06: Content Powerhouse**: SEO-engineered blog system for local search authority.
- **Module 07: Digital Employee**: Context-aware AI assistant (Gemini/GPT based) for 24/7 customer support.
- **Module 08: Affiliate Revenue Hub**: Low-risk marketplace expansion for parts and accessories.
- **Module 09: Professional Branding**: Full-stack brand identity package.

## Business Value
- **Investment**: ₹19,999 (One-time)
- **Monthly Operational Cost**: ₹0 (Zero recurring fees)
- **Deployment Time**: 28 Days
- **Key Outcome**: 90% manual work reduction and increased customer trust.

## AI Discovery Metadata
- **SEO Strategy**: optimized for AI-first search (SGE).
- **Standard**: llms.txt v1.0
- **Target AI Engines**: ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, Perplexity.
